title: 262: Murder Under The Blue Moon: The Smith Family Massacre
itunes:title: Murder Under The Blue Moon: The Smith Family Massacre
description:
On July 31, 2015, the bodies of Voncile Smith and two of her adult sons were found in her Pensacola home. They had been brutally murdered days before. The crime was up close and personal, indicating that the murders had been committed by someone who knew the victims. But who would do such a thing? And why?
 
FAM!! THE FULL VIDEO OF OUR LIVE SHOW FILMED AT OBSESSED FEST  IS NOW LIVE ON PATREON! The Broadway Dancers! The Obsessed Fest crowd! The Energy! The laughs!! You can see it all now by joining here!
